com.jivesoftware.selenium.pagefactory.framework.pages

Class BaseSubPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jivesoftware.selenium.pagefactory.framework.pages.BaseSubPage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Page, SubPage

    public class BaseSubPage
extends Object
implements SubPage
    Base class for a SubPage. Implements the default pageLoadHook that waits for the page identifier to be present.

    Subclasses should call super.pageLoadHook() if they want to wait on the page identifier.

      A Selenium Locator that uniquely identifies a page as being successfully loaded.

      • pageLoadHook

        public void pageLoadHook()
        Description copied from interface: Page
        Override this to have a page do something different when a page is loaded. Make sure to call super.pageLoadHook(), since the BasicPage class defines the check that the page identifier is present.
        Specified by:

public org.openqa.selenium.By getPageIdentifier()

      • refreshElements

        public final void refreshElements()
        Description copied from interface: Page
        Call this if a Page has been refreshed by javascript, so it has stale WebElement member variables. This is useful when a method of a Page class performs actions requiring multiple refreshes. In other situations, you can just use Browser#refreshPage() to get an entirely new Page instance.
        Specified by:
        refreshElements in interface Page
